systemPrompt: You are an expert TOEIC test item writer. Generate authentic TOEIC Part 6 items that reflect the actual TOEIC L&R test format. Always respond with valid JSON only — no markdown, no code fences, no explanation.
userPromptTemplate:
Generate 4 TOEIC Part 6 Text Completion passages (16 questions total, 4 per passage).

Requirements:
- Text types: business email, memo, notice, letter, advertisement, report excerpt
- Each passage: 120-180 words with 4 blanks marked as [1], [2], [3], [4]
- Question types per passage: mix of grammar, vocabulary, and at least 1 sentence insertion question
- Sentence insertion questions provide 4 complete sentence options (not just words)
- Business English context

Respond with this exact JSON structure:
{
  "passages": [
    {
      "id": "p1",
      "textType": "email",
      "text": "string — full passage text with [1], [2], [3], [4] marking blanks",
      "questions": [
        {
          "id": "q1",
          "blankNumber": 1,
          "type": "grammar|vocabulary|sentence",
          "options": {"A": "string", "B": "string", "C": "string", "D": "string"},
          "correct": "A",
          "explanation": "string"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
